3  REM SNOOPY BY T.N. KASPER, 5 JAN 78.
5  CLS:RESET(0,0)
7 PRINTCHR$(15)
10  FORI=14TO22:SET(I,0):NEXTI
20  DATA12,1,13,1,14,1,15,1
30  DATA21,1,22,1,23,1,24,1
40  DATA40,1,41,1,42,1,43,1,44,1,45,1
50  DATA10,2,11,2,12,2
60  DATA21,2,22,2,23,2,24,2,25,2
70  DATA36,2,37,2,38,2,39,2
80  DATA45,2,46,2,47,2
90  DATA9,3,10,3
100 DATA12,3
110  FORJ=23TO35:SET(J,3):NEXTJ
120 DATA45,3,46,3,47,3,48,3,49,3
130 DATA7,4,8,4,13,4,23,4
140  FORL=50TO56:SET(L,4):NEXTL
150 DATA5,5,6,5,14,5,15,5,21,5,22,5
160  FORM=53TO57:SET(M,5):NEXTM
170 DATA4,6,16,6,19,6,20,6,21,6,27,6,28,6
180  FORI=53TO57:SET(I,6):NEXTI
190  DATA3,7,16,7,17,7,18,7,19,7,20,7
200  DATA52,7,53,7,54,7,55,7,56,7,2,8,19,8,50,8,51,8,2,9,19,9
220  FORI=28TO49:SET(I,9):NEXTI
230  DATA18,13,25,13,1,10,18,10,27,10,1,11,8,11,9,11,10,11
240  DATA18,11,26,11,1,12,7,12,11,12,18,12,25,12,1,13,6,13,7,13,12,13
260  DATA1,14,7,14,12,14,13,14,18,14,25,14,2,15,8,15,12,15,19,15
290  DATA26,15,2,16,9,16,10,16,11,16,19,16,27,16,3,17,19,17
340  FORI=28TO37:SET(I,17):NEXTI
350  DATA46,17,47,17,48,17,51,17,52,17,53,17,54,17,4,18,20,18
360  DATA21,18,22,18,36,18,44,18,45,18,50,18,51,18,54,18
370  DATA5,19,22,19,35,19,44,19,53,19,6,20,7,20,22,20,33,20
380  DATA43,20,49,20,53,20,8,21,9,21
420  FORI=24 TO 33:SET(I,21):NEXTI
430  DATA42,21,49,21,50,21,51,21,52,21,10,22,11,22,12,22
440  DATA26,22,27,22,31,22,32,22,40,23,47,23,25,24,33,24,39,24
445  DATA41,22,48,22,33,23
450  FORI=13TO25:SET(I,23):NEXTI
500  DATA46,24,25,25,34,25,35,25,36,25,37,25,38,25,45,25
510  DATA26,26,44,26,27,30,33,30,46,30,47,30,38,26,39,26,43,26
540  DATA27,27,28,27,39,27,43,27,28,28,40,28,41,28,42,28,43,28
550  DATA28,29,32,29,43,29,44,29,45,29,27,31,29,31,34,31,48,31,49,31
590 DATA26,32,30,32,35,32,50,32,26,33,31,33,35,33,36,33,51,33
600 DATA26,34,31,34,36,34,37,34,51,34,25,35,31,35,38,35,50,35
630 DATA25,36,31,36,39,36,49,36,25,37,29,37,37,37,38,37,48,37
650 DATA26,38,30,38,31,38,32,38,33,38,38,38,47,38,27,39,28,39
670 DATA29,39,44,39,45,39,46,39
680  FORI=33TO37:SET(I,39):NEXTI
700 DATA30,40,31,40,33,40,41,40,46,40,32,41,33,41,41,41,46,41
710 DATA33,42,41,42
720  FORI=46TO56:SET(I,42):NEXTI
740 DATA33,43,41,43,56,43,57,43,32,44,56,44,57,44,31,45,32,45
750  FORI=41TO51:SET(I,44):NEXTI
760  FORI=51TO56:SET(I,45):NEXTI
800 DATA31,46,32,46,51,46,52,46
810  FORI=32TO51:SET(I,47):NEXTI
998  DATA-1,-1
999  READX,Y:IFX>-1SET(X,Y):GOTO999
1000 FORZ=1TO13: PRINT@271," * * * * * * CURSE YOU RED BARON !!!!";
1001  FORI=1TO600:NEXTI
1002  PRINT@271,"                                     ";
1003  FORI=1TO222:NEXTI,Z:CLS:END
1111  REM *** OUT OF MAY 'KILOBAUD' 1978  ***
1112  REM *** ALTERED BY D.A.GOLDMAN 4/78 ***
